Header.title: Hello üëãüèª
Header.paragraph: I help make developer tools at Microsoft.

About.paragraph: I am a Group Progam Manager at Microsoft working on Visual Studio Code, TypeScript, Azure, and GitHub. I've always been involved with Developer tools, starting my career answering the phones (and CompuServe)!
Why2: Program Manager: Visual Studio Platform and Ecosystem
Program Manager: Visual Studio Code and TypeScript

Projects.title: Open Folder Context Menu
